list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX afn: <http://jena.hpl.hp.com/ARQ/function#>
SELECT ?terminologyContextNode ?referencedTerm ?entryTerm ?termLabel ?termType WHERE { ?subject ?property ?terminologyContextNode . ?terminologyContextNode core:referencedTerm ?referencedTerm . ?terminologyContextNode core:entryTerm ?entryTerm . ?terminologyContextNode core:termLabel ?termLabel . ?terminologyContextNode core:termType ?termType . } ORDER BY ?termLabel
